stepTitle:
Consider the following reaction:

N₂(g) + 3H₂(g) ⇌ 2NH₃(g)

If the enthalpy change (ΔH) for this reaction is $$-92.6$$ $$ rac{kJ}{mol}$$ and the entropy change (ΔS) is $$-198.3$$ $$ rac{J}{mol·K}$$, calculate the temperature range in which the reaction is spontaneous. Select the correct answer from the choices below:
choices: The reaction is not spontaneous at any temperature.
